img_text: Complex Today COM PLEX INSIDE TAY-K'S REPORTED JAIL GANG AND OTHER ALLEGED CRIMES Rapper Tay-K 47, born Taymore McIntyre, was locked up and accused of murdering 21-year-old Ethan Walker in 2016 and 23-year-old Mark Anthony Saldivar in 2017. He is currently behind bars at the Tarrant County Jail in Texas. Since his incarceration in 2017, several reports have surfaced tying him to heinous acts during his stint inside, including being accused of atttacking inmates, selling drugs, and allegedly forming a gang. Here's everything you need to know about the offenses Tay-K stands accused of committing while behind bars.
